items.question: If this film is part of a trilogy, how important is it that the three be seen in order?: Can you watch any one of the three without confusion?
Is "Oldboy" based on a novel?
items.answer: Oldboy is based loosely on a Japanese manga "Old Boy", written by and Garon Tsuchiya. Oldboy, the film, is the second installment of The Vengeance Trilogy, preceded by Boksuneun naui geot (2002) and followed by Chinjeolhan geumjassi (2005). Edit

items.question: Is the movie ending the same as in the manga?
items.answer: No, the ending is totally different. There are new characters involved, and the ultimate cause for Wojin's revenge is not the same as in the movie.

spoilerItems.question: Who murdered Dae-Su's wife?
spoilerItems.answer: The guy (Woo-jin Lee) who kidnapped him because he wanted to kill any woman Oh dae-su loved.
